1.content:
It was another typical day as a young brown haired guy called Tim was sweeping the floor of an establishment called the pretty pastries. The reason for this was due to the fact he had just finished high school and just secured a job working at a local café. The pay wasn’t great and the hours were long but he wasn’t the type to complain, especially as it was almost the end of his shift. “Hey Tim, thanks for all your hard work this week.” A middle aged woman bellowed, while giving him a fairly painful slap on the back that knocked the air from his lungs and almost sending him tumbling into the road.

         Dusting yourself off you turned to face your mystery slapper only to come face to face with your boss. She was a woman with deep scarlet coloured hair in her mid-forties. She was also fairly chubby woman, not fat but with some definite curves. Most likely from a few indulgences from the many cakes and pastries that she made. “Thanks Miss Labelle, it was a pleasure” You smiled. Only to have her slam her hand once more into your shoulder “Hahaha I told you call me Marie. Also if you keep up that hard work kiddo and you just may be my favourite little worker. In fact if you take the rest of the trash out I’ll let you sneak off early” She smiled. “Just don’t let Holly catch you or I’ll never here the end of it” Before giving another hearty laugh and bounding back inside.

         You pumped your fist in joy, quickly regaining your composure however as you realised how embarrassing it was to be doing that out in public. Then as quick as a flash you picked up your broom and headed out towards the back of the kitchen, stashing the broom in a closet and moving to the alcove out back where the trash was kept in a small cage for transporting to the dumpster. With relative ease you swung the cage out through the back door into the small alleyway out back and began to unload the many bags into the nearest dumpster. You were just about to shut the lid and eagerly head home when something dark and red glistened amongst the many trash bags.

Shrugging your shoulders you shut the lid and began heading back inside to gather things. As quietly as you could you looked about hoping not to run into Holly. You gave a sigh of relief seeing that Marie was keeping her occupied, so you rushed to get changed. Quick as a flash you removed your uniform and donned your usual jeans, hoody and skate shoes. With the same burst of speed you then rushed to the back door again and had just managed to slip out when the sound of Holly yelling her displeasure of your early release. “Phew glad I made it out of there, Holly can be pretty scary when she’s pissed off” You chuckled.

         Feeling a chilling breeze you decided to not waste any more time and began to head home. As you passed the dumpster once more you remembered that odd object that glistened inside. Curiosity finally got the better of you as you decided to once and for all see what it was. With another tug you lifted the lid and grabbed the object while slightly coating your hand in something sticky that you hoped was just left over food. With a quick wipe of your hand on your jeans you brought the item to your face. It was a curious item a blood red chunk of crystal attached to a solid silver chain with numerous odd looking symbols across the links. Upon closer inspection the crystal appeared as though it was broken and you couldn’t tell how many pieces of it had been lost. Even so you couldn’t believe someone would just throw this away, I mean it still looked amazing and must still be worth something for the chain at least. “You know what finders keepers as they say” you said giving a quick glance to make sure no one was looking and snapping the chains clasp around your neck.

         Suddenly a female voice called out “Tsk tsk tsk, another naughty boy playing with something he shouldn’t” it teased. Smoke then began to twirl around your feet, slowly raising and coiling around your legs. You attempted to move but the smoke seemed to hold you in place as another couple of pillars of dark black smoke raised and clutched at your arms. Panicking you attempted to scream but a clawed red hand came up from behind and covered your mouth and a searing hot breath then whispered into your ear. “Well then I must thank you for releasing me from that dammed necklace and as thanks I shan’t kill you on this most splendid of nights” Your eyes now bulging in pure terror as you tugged hard to free your trapped limbs. “In fact all I really want to do after that millennia trapped is have a little fun, that isn’t a bad thing right?” She giggled as more smoke rose to cover your mouth, allowing her to step out in front of you.

         You couldn’t believe your eyes before you stood a pure red demonic woman with two pointy horns jutting out from a head of long dark hair that seemed darker than the abyss itself. Her bosom tightly packed into a corset that seemed to be made of some form of bones adorned with small skulls. Her legs filled a pair of deep black trousers that seemed impossible tight and knee high boots that had a heel that seemed as sharp as any blade.

         “So then my little friend in thanks for not killing you will play a role in my new game” She haughtily laughed, pacing the small dimly lit alley with a constant clatter of heels. “The rules are simple all you have to do is find the other pieces of that pretty little necklace around your neck. If you manage that you win and I shall leave you in peace. Of course to make the game more entertaining I will be adding a couple handicaps. Oh and don’t try taking off that necklace or running away, you won’t like what will happen” She winked. “So do we have a deal? Nod your pretty little head if you agree” With death being your only alternative you hurriedly nodded yes in response. “Perfect then let the game begin!” She cackled as a blinding light flashed towards you.

Option 1: Tim is cursed to be an inch tall.

Option 2: Tim is cursed to be an inch tall and viewed as a bug

Option 3: Tim is cursed to be an inch tall and transforms into an object that fits his surroundings if seen by a woman.

Option 4: Custom curse

Option 5: Custom curse
1.title: Meeting a Demon

11.content:
After rubbing your eyes vigorously to try and massage the pain from that blinding light, you were quick to survey the area. Thankfully the demon was nowhere to be seen and you gave a deep sigh of relief. “I must be tired, that’s all” You chanted to yourself. It was only when you began to move on that things were dramatically different from before.

         The once small alley was now an impossibly wide chasm; the cracks that littered its poorly maintained asphalt were more akin to ditches and trenches then mere surface damage. The very dumpster not moments ago you were using was stood as a terrifying movable skyscraper. “This can’t be happening” You screamed. “I must have slipped on something and banged my head. There is no way I can be this small” You then crouched down hugging your knees tightly as you tried desperately to control your out of control breathing as your body went into a state of shock. “Oh this is real” A very familiar voice purred in your ear.

         Once again the demoness stepped out from behind you and sashayed in front of you surprisingly not that much taller then you yourself. “I told you there would be handicaps” She winked. “How is this a handicap? You’ve made it impossible to ever find the rest of this necklace.” You yelled, your fist tightly clenching by your side. “Don’t be so defeatist my little adventurer, this makes things a lot more entertaining for me to watch and you have the rest of your life to find them so that’s plenty of time even for your little legs” She cackled. “The rest of my life? Just how long do you think a guy my size will last out here?” You spat in anger. “Even stepping out of this alley into the street will probably get me trampled to death by passers-by” The demoness then gave a quizzical look tapping one of her long nailed fingers on her chin. “Hhhhmmm you may be right, you are quite likely to get squashed I guess” Then with a simple shrug she began to grow before your very eyes once more. “Guess I should probably just go ahead and save us both time and crush you now” A demonic smile creeping across her face as she lifted her boot clad foot above you. “WAIT, HOLD ON A SEC…” You screamed before her foot collapsed on top of you.

         The next few moments were the most painful you have ever felt as you felt her whole body weight compress you beneath her unrelenting sole and the hard asphalt. You waited for death to take you but it never came, all that followed was a twisting of her foot atop you as though she was snubbing out a cigarette butt. You could feel your body begin to almost liquefy into the groves of her boot as your body was smeared mercilessly. When she finally lifted her foot off she glanced at the gound and chuckled when she saw no trace of you. With no concern for you she dragged her sharp nails across the bottom of her boot, painfully digging into your squishy body and dragging you up to her face. “Hahaha oh my, you look like a little grilled pancake” She cackled, realising you now disc like body had conformed to the tread of her boot.

         She then placed you atop of her hand, and within moments you felt an odd sensation. “Did you really think I would let some clueless bimbo just walk by and kill my little adventurer?” She smiled cruelly, as you continued to feel your body twist and reshape itself. “I gave you a handicap but that doesn’t mean you don’t get some perks. For example your body is virtually indestructible in that small form. You can get crushed, flattened, stomped, smeared and a whole other things I hope you get to discover and then always return to normal when left alone.” When she had finally finished her little speech you had indeed returned to your small human form just as she had said. “Right I think that’s enough for today’s lesson, I’ll chat with you again soon. Now where to put you” She pondered. “Wait! I still have questions” You shouted, but she clearly was in no mood to listen as she yelled “GOT IT!” and tossed you into.
11.title: Shrunk Curse

choices: She has a bad case of demon gas for you!
She uses her strength and your new body to mold you into a thong
She shoves you into the dark, unholy depths of her bowels
114.content:
The sexy demon still has you in her hands, however she was giving you an unsettling look. One of mischief and... lust? "You know, as much as I want to see you begin your giant adventure..." The smirk on her face seemed to grow even larger, she could barely contain her urges. "Waiting for this opportunity to become free again. It was oh so boring..." She giggles, you could tell this wasn't going anywhere you would like. "So before I set you free, you are going to be my toy!" Her grip tightens around you. This demon was already cruel enough to curse you and stomp you flat, and now you were going to be her toy? You try to speak again, only for the air to be squeezed out of you, your attempts to speak not being acknowledged in the slightest.

"Now little mortal... prepare yourself for my own special kind of torture, your pain will taste so good!" She moves you behind her, giving you a good view of her ass. It was possibly one of the sexiest asses you've ever seen, showing it off perfectly. Just looking at it aroused you despite your terror, she noticed this. "Ah, you like my butt? Wonderful, it will be even more satisfying to turn it into your worst nightmare!" She grabs the rear of her pants and peels them away which a sickening squelching sound. This ended your arousal quickly and you were given an excellent look at her ass as she held you above the opening. Her smooth red butt cheeks were coated in sweat. It looked like you could drown in it! Then the smell hit. "Oh my god!" You cry out, trying to move your arms out to cover your nose. "I've stolen the souls of many with this ass, they are doomed to forever dwell in my bowels, suffering..." She tells you. "You are indestructible however, so you are quite lucky..."

Without further delay, she drops you right in. Unfortunately, you plummet right into her crack, sliding nicely between the sweat coated cheeks. The smell was far more powerful shoved right against it. Just at this instant you felt you were going to become another soul damned to an eternity in her ass. "It stinks so much, let me-" You begin crying out, but before you can finish her pants snap against you, launching you between her swampy cheeks. Sweat flew right into your screaming mouth. "Let you in deeper? Of course~" She teases.

You were unable to move at all. All you could do was squirm fruitlessly against her infinitely strong cheeks. You could feel yourself sticking from her slick sweat coating. It was getting difficult to even squirm a little! The sweat you just drank was the foulest thing you ever tasted. It felt like your mouth and throat were on fire, slowly your taste buds were being consumed with foul demon sweat, taking away your sense of taste and replacing it with sweat taste. "Perhaps now is a good time to tell you, demon sweat is one of the worst tasting substances of the infernal and mortal realms, however..." She giggles. "It is highly addictive, don't drink it! Not like it will matter, I'll make sure you're good to go when I release you!" When you heard this you could feel the effect kicking in. Suddenly on impulse, you give one of her giant cheeks a huge lick. You scream in pain as the the taste became even stronger. "You drank it didn't you!?" She lets out a loud and wicked laugh. "You are so kind, licking my cheeks. Maybe I should make you my little butt slave since you like it so much, hm?" She teases, you could hear her moan. She was getting very aroused from your suffering. Suddenly you couldn't stop, as much as it hurt you kept licking. And it seemed no matter how much you drank, the gallons of sweat never went away.

"I can tell you are suffering more than you ever have in your life! So delicious!" She moans. "However, this is only the beginning!"
114.title: Demon's Toy

choices: You manage to squeeze in and get to taste some more of her ass.
She takes you out and leaves. You try to replace the addiction.
1141.content:
She carefully strokes the back of your head, slowly nudging your face deeper into her scrumptious ass hole. Your mouth is wide open and your tongue is out involuntarily as you try to swallow more of her disgusting ass sweat. You prod your tongue as deep into her ass and start swirling it around, lapping up more and more juicy demon sweat, the disgusting taste lingers in your throat but you can't help yourself. She giggles and moans over your suffering, her finger pressed against the back of your head keeps you in place and allows you tongue to get a little deeper as time goes on. You hear a short stomach gurgle and a deafening roar your head to jolt against her finger. Your mouth wide open, disgustingly delicious ass nectar blows into the back of your throat and your nostrils flair up. The smell increases as you feel another blow against your face, you try to pull away swallowing another mass of fart sweat but her finger is keeping you in place. You can no longer see into her dark chasm as your eyes blind from the stench, you can hear her laughing "oops these are really loud, someone might notice me, lets go somewhere much more private" Her finger releases from the back of your head and she releases another unholy wind pushing your face away from her ass hole. You try to keep away but you can still see some sweat back between her flaming hot crack. You force yourself forward tongue outstretched, you manage to lick a very small amount of her putrid oasis as another gust punches you to the back of her panties. You try desperately to crawl up into her crack just for one more mouthful but her staggeringly beautiful cheeks keep knocking you back. She giggles quietly "I'll let you have my ass all to yourself if you wait, we're almost there"

Your head is screaming, you haven't tasted her sweat in a while, you desperately try to get some more into your mouth but fail with every attempt as her two boulders block your path. You hear a door closing and the world shifts, you fall directly into her ass. You see a pool of dark water in her hole, you push your head deep into the pool of ass sweat so it covers your whole head, you're almost drowning in it as you gulp it down, each drop goes down like poison, burning your throat but you can't stop. You turn around as a huge beam of light appears from behind you and a big red hand comes down and grabs you. You notice she's now laying against a bed as she brings you close to her face, biting her lip "Thank you for giving me this pleasure, it looks like you've drunk a lot of my sweat, do you want more?" she teases, you try to say no but you can't stop yourself from nodding, "well go and drink as much as you want" she places you on the back of her defined pants, you leap head first into her crack covered by the cloth. It feels like sandpaper against your tongue as you try to lick sweat through her pants, your head starts to hurt as you desperately grasp at her backside desperate for some of her ass sweat. Another thunderous thud belts your face as she lets rip another surprise. You get up on your feat and stand on the top of her pants just below her back. "Oh I thought you wanted some more" she says through a laugh. You try to pull up the fabric and reach in but you can't lift it high enough, her pants are too tight. You open up a little segment, the swamp sweat leaks out and causes blindness for a second but you persist despite the odour and stick your head in a little, the pants snap back on your head and you become trapped trying to get another taste. You flail around but can't seem to move.
1141.title: She has a bad case of demon gas for you!

choices: Back to your work the next day
13.content:
The demons laughter was still ringing in your ears and your surroundings slowly came back into focus. What was once the alley seemed to have drastically changed. You rubbed your eyes in disbelief as what was once the back of your workplace was now a large room lined with cracked stone floors that seemed to spit white hot embers randomly. Large pieces of furniture were also scattered across the room, all seeming to be made of some strange materials you failed to recognise. In fact the sofa which stood just behind you appeared to be made of a mixture of onyx coloured horn and some bestial furs of deep scarlet. “What the hell is this? Why the fuck is everything so large?” you screamed. “Now, now is that any way to act when someone invites you into their home?” A seductive tone whispered from above.

         Glancing up towards the source of the noise your eyes were drawn towards the seat above. Once more you shuddered in fear as her fiery eyes met yours and her toothy smirk appeared again. With a swift motion she flipped over folding her legs across the back of her sofa and dangling her long hair down around you and putting her enormous face uncomfortably close to your puny body. “Arww you look so adorable that size, I could just eat you up” Her eyes painfully staring into yours as her tongue traced over her top lip. Beyond terrified you instantly turned, sprinting full pace to anywhere other than here. You didn’t make it far however as a slimy object snaked its way around your torso. Panicked you attempted to peel yourself out from its grasp but its slimy surface gave you no grip whatsoever. The slimy creature then began to drag you back towards the demon you attempted to flee from. Defeated you turned to face your tormentor once more when you came to a horrifying conclusion, this was no snake like creature but in fact the large demon woman’s tongue.

         With renewed vigour of not wanting to become some giant demons afternoon snack you began to wriggle and squirm with all your might, hoping desperately for some way out of this. The demon woman’s eyes seemed to enjoy watching your futile struggles as they appeared to glisten and small smile lines appeared around the corners as she teasingly inched you closer to her gaping maw. No matter what you tried you couldn’t seem to release the tongues vice like grip as you finally reached her lips. With a last defiant scream you passed her dark lips and were plunged into a hot, dark and humid cave that was her mouth.

         Once inside her tongue finally released its grip on you, wasting no time you began to crawl desperately across its squishy, slippery surface towards the entrance. After many tumbles as the cave seemed to twist and shift about you reached her large flawlessly white teeth each one seeming as sharp as swords. And gingerly began to attempt to pass by them. As soon as you came within an inch of them however they slammed together with a deafening thud. What was once your exit was now a solid wall of teeth you had no chance of passing. “Let me out!” You pleaded, not noticing her tongue once more rising behind you as you continued to bang on her prison wall. Quick as a python the tongue lunged at you caressing you all over as it forced you painfully against her teeth. The sound of girlish laughter and soft moans reverberated around you as her tongue continued to probe you.

         You were quickly losing your strength as the unrelenting licking continued, slightly ashamed you were even starting to enjoy the sensation as it rubbed and brushed across your genitals. You limp dick even began to rise to the occasion as the tongue’s tip flicked it up and down. The pleasure of course was not to last as you began to feel your skin slightly tingle, moments went by and the tingle had escalated to a mild stinging. It was then you noticed your clothes had begun dissolving, fizzling away into mush that the tongue happily lapped away. “No, please I don’t want to die not like this!” You pleaded, pushing and fighting for any chance of escape. For once the demon woman appeared to listen as her teeth began to part and you were unceremoniously spat atop her waiting palm.

         “Hey there, sorry I should have mentioned demon spit is a bit acidic” The demon giggled giving her head a slight tap as if to say her bad. “You just looked sooo tasty and I haven’t eaten in so long I just wanted a little taste. No harm done anyway” You quickly snapped back “No harm done! I’m partly digested because of that little taste” You yelled, cupping your now naked junk. “Oh please you’re barely burnt, only your clothes were really damaged you big drama queen” She huffed. “Besides clothes get in the way of our little game” With that the demon placed you down upon what appeared to be a chest of drawers with a vanity mirror and various bottles scattered across its surface. “You remember how I said you have to fetch the pieces of the necklace and would be giving you handicaps to make it even more fun? She said glancing down on you. “So what you’re going to make me find them at this tiny size while being completely naked?” You answered back in complete shock. “That’s impossible!” The demon simply laughed at your little outburst. “Improbable is the better word, I wouldn’t want the game to end to quickly you know” pacing about, she continued. “In fact it’s why I came up with the best rule yet, the rule of sight”

         Her eyes were now flickering with excitement as she opened a drawer of panties below you. “You see when you’re about in your world and a woman catches a glimpse of you, like this” Her eyes casually passing over to you and a strange feeling began to build inside you. With a gasp for help you felt your body contort and change shape. Your face began flattening out into a sheet as well as you torso folding you into an odd hammock shape. Your arms and legs then began rising up above you and forming into some sort of loop. “Your whole body will transform to fit your surroundings; sort of like a kind of camouflage” She giggled picking you up and showing yourself to the mirror. “See look you’ve become a cute pair of panties, thanks to you hanging around my panty drawer when I spotted you” You attempted to scream but found you couldn’t produce a single noise. “Yeah no one will hear you when you’re transformed apart from me of course; I can keep in touch using that lovely bit of jewellery around your neck. That way I can still hear all your pitiful screams. Oh I also made sure to leave all your senses in fact wouldn’t want you to miss out on all the feels, sights, sounds, smells and taste the world has to offer.” Placing you down once more on the drawers she turned away from you.
Almost instantly you felt your body begin to revert back to its shrunken form. “See, and when no one is touching or looking at you, you can revert back to your little form and begin looking again. I can’t wait to see what you get turned into on your journey. Now where to send you back, to begin your journey?” she pondered before deciding.
13.title: Transformation Curse

info.brief_description: Tim meets a demon that plays a twisted game.
info.description:
Decided to kind of make an origin story for how Tim got shrunk in Unaware Giantess TF and met his roommates. As its never really explained how they all came together. So hopefully this will help fill in the blanks.

As far as rules go:
1. To make the story fit all curses involve Tim being shrunk and having the same durability as Unaware Giantess TF.
1. No other males (except the main character).
2. Read what was written before you if you are making an addition to the story so it will make sense.
3. All characters are aged between 18 and 40
4. Have fun!

Other than that people enjoy.
